document.full_text: the former chief executive officer of bankrupt taylor, bean & whitaker mortgage corp pleaded guilty on friday over his role in a $1.5 billion fraud scheme, the u.s. justice department said.
document.title: ex-tbw executive pleads guilty to mortgage fraud
lines_and_colors: the former chief executive officer of bankrupt taylor, bean & whitaker mortgage corp pleaded guilty on friday over his role in a $1.5 billion fraud scheme, the u.s. justice department said.
